dmca.title: Pet Friendly Dogs A Possible Infringer
dmca.body:
May 19, 2006

Pet Friendly Travel
Attn: Management/Owner
PO Box 2752
Toluca Lake, CA 91610

Pet Friendly Travel,

Please let this certified letter be one of courtesy for an immediate cease and desist on your company to stop the use of our federally registered trademark, PET FRIENDLY, in your business or website.

If you do not choose to immediately stop using our trademark, we will take immediate action to recover our damages to the fullest extent of the law.

Your company will then be posted as an infringer with the Attorney Generals office and the Department Of Commerce.

This is a serious matter!!

Any and all future correspondence should be forwarded to our legal department.

Sincerely,
[private]
